description: We launched an uncertain venture into a new market and we weren’t entirely sure it would pay off. Lots of challenges emerged when we first set up our business and we eventually decided to get outside help. Mythos was key to our later success. Our company would not be the same without their help in the marketing and regulatory areas. The beginnings of a business is nerve-racking and until you make your first stream of steady cash flow, you really don’t know if the right decisions have been made. Mythos gave us the foundation to establish our digital presence and create a brand identity that made sure clients trusted us .

Mythos built us two new websites, one for our original company and another for our new project management company. They also provided us with all of our brand identity, marketing, and other corporate materials that helped our companies become more presentable and professional . We do feel that our companies receive the respect they deserve from contractors, prospective clients, banks, and the city because of the immediate impact our new corporate image has on outsiders.
